text:
手の温度も、触り方も、俺が勝手に知ってしまったものだった。
「イサミの髪は、硬いな……」
そう言って、頭皮に手をすべらせる。
その感触が気持ちよくて、ずっと触っていて欲しい、と思っていた。
こうやって、お前に触られるのが好きなんだ。
そう言いたくなって、また罪悪感に襲われた。
スミスの知らないところで、彼に身体を触らせた。
trans:
The warmth of his hand and the way he touched me - those were things I had come to know on my own.
"Isami, your hair is quite stiff..."
He said that as he slid his hand over my scalp.
The sensation felt so comforting that I wished he would keep touching me forever.
I like it when you touch me like this.
I wanted to say that, but once again, I was overcome with guilt.
In a place Smith did not know about, I had let him touch my body.
